statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE churn > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, churn FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, churn FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date, churn FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE last_purchase_date > '2021-01-01' AND churn < 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%shoes%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE last_purchase_date < '2021-05-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history, last_purchase_date, churn FROM CustomerBehaviorForecast WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND churn > 0.7 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, subscription_status FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_score > 0.5;
SELECT name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, prediction_date, churn_probability FROM churn_prediction WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, behavior_score FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_behavior WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = true ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_score > 0.5 AND age < 40;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, cp.churn_probability FROM customer_behavior c JOIN churn_prediction cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.churn_probability > 0.7;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, subscription_status, last_purchase_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChurnPredictions ORDER BY prediction_accuracy DESC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_probability FROM ChurnPredictions WHERE churn_probability > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) FROM CustomerBehavior GROUP BY behavior_type;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC, satisfaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT behavior_type, behaviour_timestamp FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = 2002 ORDER BY behaviour_timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(churn_probability) AS max_churn_prob FROM ChurnPredictions;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, notes FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_rating, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC, feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT c.name, p.total_amount, p.purchase_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.id = p.customer_id WHERE p.payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND p.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY p.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT f.customer_id, f.satisfaction_rating, f.feedback_date, c.name FROM feedback f LEFT JOIN customers c ON f.customer_id = c.id ORDER BY f.feedback_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 3;
